response.job_title: MS. in Computer and Systems Engineering
response.summary: Systems Engineer with a Master's degree in Computer and Systems Engineering. Four years of experience in software engineering and full-stack development. Knowledge of best practices for the software development life cycle, including agile methodologies, code reviews, source control management, deployment, testing, and maintenance. Interested in software engineering, entrepreneurship, cybersecurity, and artificial intelligence.
response.skills: Programming, Data Analysis, Interviewing, Databases, OOP, Full-Stack Development, Software Development, Scrum, JavaScript, React.js, Análisis de datos, Solution Architecture, Ruby on Rails, Python, Flask, Docker, Java, Entrevistas, Linux, MongoDB
